name: Thwim

attributes.name: Affiliation(s)
values: Lady Valarian's criminal empireLucky Despot Hotel & Casino

content: Thwim was a Kubaz security guard employed by the Whiphid, Lady Valarian. He worked at the front reception area of the Lucky Despot Hotel & Casino shortly before the Battle of Yavin. Thwim was acquaintances with the Bith jizz musician known as Doikk Na'ts, and ushered Doikk and the rest of his band, the Modal Nodes, into the Star Chamber Caf√©. Thwim was present when enforcers for Jabba Desilijic Tiure as well as Imperial stormtroopers raided the casino disrupting the wedding of Lady Valarian and D'Wopp.
